transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Good morning, this is Michael from ABC Collections. May I speak with Mr. Anderson?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I'm calling to follow up on your payment plan for your credit card balance. According to our records, you agreed to pay $200 monthly.

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: Yes, and I've already sent this month's payment. It should be posted by tomorrow.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thank you for keeping up with your payments. I'll make a note that the payment is being processed. Is there anything else I can help you with?
